value:
Is there a cleric here by the name of
Serra, by chance? I just want to avoid
getting involved in any more trouble...

Has anyone ever told you that
you remind them of a tactician
from Elibe?

I am not cut out for battle. My dream
is to be a person worthy of respect,
and to establish a place of research.

Magic feels the same in this world.
That must mean, like the people, the
spirits are similar to those in Elibe...

Ah... Pardon me. Just a moment.
I am nearly done with this book...

I've been sent to bring this to you,
from $Nf.
Yes! This is the feeling I live for.

Phew... One more battle, and then
can we rest a bit?

I want to control the magic within
me at will... If I cannot manage that,
I'll never be a first-rate mage.

I still have much to learn next to my
teacher, but I will put in whatever
effort is necessary to close that gap.

I am Erk. I am to be my teacher's
ideal student.

...$k$p...Hm?$k$p...Ah! So sorry! Yes, I am all right.
I must have dozed off there.$k$pMy teacher, Lord Pent, who trained
me in magic, found me sleeping like
that and woke me similarly.$k$pI must admit, it is a somewhat
embarrassing way to be roused.$k$pI have been working to learn more
about the magic here—for several
days now—and I must be exhausted...$k$pI will try to be more mindful of getting
rest moving forward so I do not worry
Lord Pent...or you.
せやっ
そこだ！
くっ…
そんな…！
Let my studies show their worth!
Don't trouble yourself.
See if you can match me!
Behind me!
Lord Pent...
I see.
My name is Erk. If I am going to fight, I will show you the true power of magic!
Serra? Oh, no. It's you. You gave me a fright.
There is no stronger ally than Lord Pent. Is he here?
When I am caught up in a book, I become so absorbed that I forget even to eat.
Anything but protecting Serra again. My nerves couldn't endure it...
Lord Pent, Lady Louise... I will repay my debt to you one day.
It would please me to use the magic that I have mastered in your service.
That might work.
Well...
I'll lend you my strength.
